# Enumeration LogLevel

Log levels for telemetry logging

#### Description

Maps to VERBOSITY values in the underlying telemetry system

##### Index

### Enumeration Members

DEBUG ERROR INFO TRACE WARN

## Enumeration Members

### DEBUG

DEBUG: "DEBUG"

Debug level - detailed debugging information

#### Description

Verbosity = 1, useful for development and troubleshooting

### ERROR

ERROR: "ERROR"

Error level - error conditions

#### Description

Error messages for actual problems

### INFO

INFO: "INFO"

Info level - general information messages

#### Description

Verbosity = 0, standard operational information

### TRACE

TRACE: "TRACE"

Trace level - most verbose logging

#### Description

Verbosity = 2, captures all possible log messages

### WARN

WARN: "WARN"

Warning level - potential issues

#### Description

Important messages about potential problems

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
